overview: Fu Huaicun, who was determined to become an actor, joined Jiang Qiyun's performance workshop under the introduction of actor Zhou Xu. Fu Huaixun spent an unforgettable and wonderful time in constant contact with Jiang Qiyun. At the same time, the relationship between the two continued to heat up, and together they revealed a hurried past between Fu Huaicun and Zhou Xingzhang.
title: Youth Crossing the Breeze
